full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support, We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below: https://support.combinate.me/requests/30456/satisfaction/new/Zk8BMOqqOG1dt2CEk09lgmPtt?locale=1176 Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about: Jenn Nebres (Combinate Support) 16 Jun 2025, 12:30 GMT+10 Hi Rica, Instead of displaying the PDF on the page, can we replace it with these images I attached as the client doesn't want PDF screenshots on it? https://www.oncobeta.com.au/?post_type=education&p=1775&preview=true Kindly check for mobile-friendliness too, please. Second, can you use the image from this link https://cbo.d.pr/i/gt686X as a thumbnail on the list view - https://www.oncobeta.com.au/education/? We'd appreciate receiving the updated page(s) as soon as possible. Regards, Jenn Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 Attachment(s) EPIC-Skin 12-Month Study Clinical Paper_PAGE 2.png EPIC-Skin 12-Month Study Clinical Paper_PAGE 1.png WolfIQ Support 13 Jun 2025, 16:16 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Sorry for the back and fourth. I made sure that the pdf file is pasted in the post and added the CTA button for Download. Here's the preview link: https://www.oncobeta.com.au/?post_type=education&p=1775&preview=true Let me know if you need further assistance. Thanks, Rica Rosario Valencia support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2967644791-156306#}

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -##

Your request (#30456) has been received and is being reviewed by our support staff.

To add additional comments, reply to this email or click the link below:
https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30456

Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support)

12 Jun 2025, 16:06 GMT+10

Hi team,

Can we get urgent estimates for this new Education article below, please?
Title: Efficacy, Safety and Patient Experiences of Rhenium-SCT® for Non-Melanoma Skin Cancer: 12 month outcomes from the EPIC-Skin Study

Content:
At the very top, please add:
"To read the full published manuscript, visit: https://www.advancesradonc.org/article/S2452-1094(25)00089-2/fulltext

Please paste the two pages of the attached PDF

Under that, please also add a button that allows the viewer to download the actual file. CTA: DOWNLOAD HERE

The main image is to follow.

Looking forward to hearing back from you, thanks.

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

Attachment(s)
EPIC-Skin 12-Month Study Clinical Paper_v6_Digital.pdf
[9N94X6-ZWXYL]
